snippet: Two friends of the author Katherine Russell Rich, who died in 2012, have finished a novel she had started to write, which Scribner’s will publish on Tuesday.
abstract: Authors Amy Hempel and Jill Ciment write mystery thriller, The Hand That Feeds You, from novel started by Katherine Russell Rich; duo took premise, Rich’s real-life discovery that her fiance lived a shadow life, to collaborate on suspenseful novel as tribute to Rich, friend who lost decades-long breast cancer battle in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Two friends of the author Katherine Russell Rich, who died in 2012, have finished a novel she had started to write, which Scribner’s will publish on Tuesday.

headline.main: ‘The Hand That Feeds You,’ a Thriller Written as an Act of Love for Its Originator
headline.print_headline: A Thriller Inspired by Betrayal, Then Love
